# Rock & Roll Services

> Professional event services company specializing in major outdoor events, music festivals, and concerts since 2018.

## About Rock & Roll Services

Rock & Roll Services provides comprehensive support for major outdoor events, particularly music festivals and live concerts. Based on deep industry experience, we handle everything from site operations to artist care, ensuring events run smoothly from load-in to load-out.

**Tagline**: When second best just won't cut it.

### Services

- **Site Operations**: Management for major outdoor events including festivals and concerts
- **Logistics**: Artist and crew transport, logistics coordination, and runner services
- **Local Knowledge**: Local expertise and guidance for international tours
- **Backstage Management**: Dressing rooms and backstage area coordination
- **Security**: Security operations and management for events
- **Care**: Artist, friends & family, and VIP services

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://rockandrollservices.se/): Main landing page with company overview and services
- [Services](https://rockandrollservices.se/#services): Detailed breakdown of all service offerings

## What Makes Us Different

- **Established 2018**: Years of experience in the live events industry
- **Full-Service**: End-to-end event support from logistics to artist care
- **International**: Local knowledge support for touring acts worldwide
- **Professional**: Industry-standard security and backstage management

## Industry Focus

| Area | Expertise |
|------|-----------|
| Music Festivals | Site operations, crowd management, multi-stage coordination |
| Concerts | Backstage management, artist services, security |
| Outdoor Events | Logistics, transport, local knowledge |
| Touring Support | International tour logistics, local expertise |
